name: Game Data Bundle File
summary: Learn about .BNDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: A BNDL file is a game data bundle archive file used by game Need for Speed: Most Wanted by Electronic Arts. It is a bundle file that stores game sounds and audio streams to be used for sound effects in the game. These sound effects are used when the player plays the game. BNDL is short for bundle.

File extension used for bundle files, which are data archives used in some applications or computer games, notably the Need For Speed: Most Wanted racing game titles; in the Need For Speed title, BNDL files include audio streams and other game sounds such as engine and siren sounds and other sound effects.
